Message.Title: CLINT EASTWOOD was ACES!
Message.Msg: A real man. Full of class and character. Discipline and dignity. Just like the late Charles Bronson or Chuck Norris who were and are incorruptible by the Hollywood PIGS. Compare these folk to the filth of the likes of the unkempt michael moore who escaped from the group home one day and never returned. The Republican Convention was a blessing of encouragement and true hope to change the big mistake made in '08.

Topic.Title: chief economist and chief strategist at National Bank Financial in Montreal:SP500 at 1350 fully priced

Message.Msg: I would not be surprised if the S&P traded up to 1500...
